mapper.select: select d.donation_bicycle_no,d.donor_id,d.address,d.detail,d.photo1,d.photo2,d.photo3,d.title ,d.story_id, r.picture from (select donation_bicycle_no,donor_id, address, detail,photo1,photo2,photo3,title,story_id from donation where donation_bicycle_no=#{value}) d,rb_member r where d.donor_id=r.id
select s.story_id as id, s.title, s.detail, r.picture as photo from (select story_id, title, detail from story where donation_bicycle_no=#{value}) s,rb_member r where s.story_id=r.id
mapper.update: update donation set story_id=#{storyId} where donation_bicycle_no=#{donationBicycleNo}
